oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of Spencer Samuel Ferguson and soldiers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A photograph of Ferguson and two other U.S. Army non-commissioned officers (NCOs) standing in front of a wooden building. The image was probably taken in a stateside training camp. The men are in uniform with campaign hats. Two show rank chevrons on their right sleeves while the other has his on the left. All appear to be ordnancemen with the flaming bomb insigna on their chevrons and collar discs.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Feguson, Spencer Samuel and soldiers
World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
